body_html: Running your command on 4 P100s (with the extra argument --num_gpus=4) gave me 870 im/s. This command may not be the best but at least it's slightly better than the old numbers (852) in https://www.tensorflow.org/performance/benchmarks. So it looks alright. My environment does have nvlink (the above link does mention nvlink), btw. Note that the best combination of options would also depend on your environment. Perhaps there is a regression on environment without nvlink but more information will be needed to find out if that's true.
